Direzione o partecipazione a comitati ed.content: Editor in Chief (DIRETTORE) of the Transnational Journal of Social Analysis "il Dubbio" (the Doubt) [ISSN: 1724-4889]
Member of the Editorial Board of the Journal of Political Culture: Alternative (Alternatives)
Editor of the Series on “Social and Political Change” for the Italian publisher Editori Riuniti, University press

Editor in Chief (DIRETTORE) of the SCOPUS International Journal of Socio-political Studies "Partecipazione e Conflitto" (Participation & Conflict) [ISSN: 1972-7623; e-ISSN: 2035-6609]: Rating ANVUR: Classe A per l'Area 14 (social sciences): http://siba-ese.unisalento.it/index.php/paco
Member of the Editorial Board of the Series (Collana) on “Globalization, Participation and Social Movements” for the Italian publisher FrancoAngeli
Editor (DIRETTORE) of the "Centre for the Study of Politics and Society – Working Paper Series" (CSPS-WP Series) [e-ISSN: 2239-7434]
Member of the Editorial Board of the Series (Collana) of “Political Sociology” for the Italian Publisher FrancoAngeli
Member of the Editorial Board of the American Journal of Sociological Research [p-ISSN: 2166-5443; e-ISSN: 2166-5451]
Member of the Editorial Board of the International Journal of Applied Sociology [p-ISSN: 2169-9704; e-ISSN: 2169-9739]
Member of the Editorial Board of the Journal Humanities and Social Sciences [p-ISSN: 2330-8176; e-ISSN: 2330-8184]
Member of the Editorial Board of DADA – Journal of Post-Global Anthropology [ISSN: 2240-0192].
Direttore insieme al collega Manuel Anselmi della collana "DEMOCRAZIE E CONFLITTI" per l'editore Meltemi (marchio recentemente acquisito dalla Mimesis)

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: (University of Calabria, Cosenza, 26-27 September): “Sinistra e destra nella campagna elettorale di Roma: cultura politica e analisi del linguaggio”, paper presented in the National Conference of the Section of Political Sociology of the Italian Sociological Association (AIS) on: “Poltical Power and Globalization”.

(University of Trento, 5-6 June): “New Global at the First European Social Forum: Politics, Democracy and Participation in the Young Antiglobalists’ Attitudes”, paper delivered in the Graduate Conference: “Globalizzazione, Conflitti, Movimenti Sociali”.
(University of Trento, 15-16 September): Chairman of the workshop: “Social Movements and Political System”, during the Graduate Conference: “Globalization, Conflicts, and Social Movements”.

(University of Trento, 15-16 September): “Sinistra e destra nell’analisi del linguaggio politico: il caso della campa¬gna per il rinnovo del sindaco di Roma”, paper delivered in the National Conference of the Italian Political Science Association (SISP).

(University of Murcia, Spain, 23-26 September): “From Local to Global: Values and Political Identity of the Young Participants in the European Social Forum”, paper delivered in the 6th Conference of the European Sociological Association (ESA).
(University of Murcia, Spain, 23-26 September): Chairman of the Panel: “Transnational Collective Action”, during the 6th Conference of the European Sociological Association (ESA).

(University of Salerno, 28-29 January): “Le trasformazioni della cultura politica nella pratica dei movimenti antiglobalisti: una comparazione tra Italia e Francia”, paper presented in the Conference on “Social Change” of the Section of Methodology of the Italian Sociological Association (AIS).

(University of Padova, 15-17 September): “Tra federalismo e sovranismo: il movimento antiglobalista e l’Europa nel caso italiano e francese” (with Luca Alteri), paper presented in the Annual Meeting of the Italian Political Science Association (SISP).
(University of Torùn, Poland, 9-12 Sepetmber): Chairman of the panel: “Political Coalitions - Politics for the Future?”, during the 7th Conference of the European Sociological Association (ESA).

(University of Torùn, Poland, 9-12 September): “Globalization and Supranational Institutions in the Attitudes of NoGlobal Activists: A Research on the Third European Social Forum”, pa-per presented at the 7th Conference of the European Sociological Association (ESA).

(University of Padova, 15-17 September): Chairman of the Panel: “The Research in Social Movements: Theoretical and Methodological Problems”, during the Annual Meeting of the Italian Poitical Science Association (SISP).

(University of Cagliari, 21-23 September): “Sinistra e trasformazione sociale. La Rifondazione comunista dalla resistenza globale al governo di alternativa”, paper presented in the Annual Meeting of the Italian Political Science Association (SISP).

(University of Perugia, 1-3 December): “Il movimento antiglobalista nel sistema politico globale. Una ricerca sul terzo forum sociale europeo”, paper presented in the National Conference of the Section of Political Sociology of the Italian Sociological Association (AIS).

(Central University of Venezuela, Caracas, 28 January): “Latinoameríca en el sistema político internacional: perspectiva de Venezuela”, international meeting organized by the Faculty of Law and Political Sciencies.

(Université de Franche-Comté, 19-21 April): “Rifondazione Comunista at its 6th National Conference: a strategy of textual and semantic analysis” (con F. della Ratta), paper delivered in the JADT 2006 (8^es Jornées Internationales d’Analyse Statistique des Données Textuelles).
(Cortona, Italy, 20-22 October): Special Guest at the Cortona Collquium 2006 in: “Cultural Conflicts, Social Movements and New Rights: A European Challenge”.
(University of Milan-Bicocca, 26-27 January): Special Guest and Discussant at the International Workshop on: “Social Movements, Religions and Political Cultures”.

(University of Rome “La Sapienza”, 28-29 June): “An Attempt at the European Public Sphere: The Case of the European Social Forum” (with L. Alteri), paper presented in the Congress of the RC 47, “Social Classes and Social Movements” of ISA, International Sociological Association.

(University of Trento, 28-30 June): “Globalization and World Politics in the Protraction of Global Dissent. The Case of the Antiglobalist Movement in the European Public Sphere”, paper presented in Congress of the Methodology Section of AIS, Italian Sociological Association.

(University of Pisa, 6-8 September): “An Attenpt at the European Public Sphere: The Case of the European Social Forum” (with L. Alteri), paper presented in the 4th Congress of the ECPR, European Consortium for Political Research.

(University of Urbino, 13-15 September): “Political Opportunity Structure e sfera pubblica eu-ropea: ridefinizione concettuali e nuovi percorsi di applicazione” (with L. Alteri), paper presented in the XXI Congress of AIS, Italian Socioogical Association.

(University of Catania, 20-22 September): Chairman of the panel on: “Multilevel Governance and Transnational Social Movements” in the Annual Congress of the Sisp, Italian Society of Political Science.

(University of Catania, 20-22 September): “Alla ricerca di una sfera pubblica Europea: il caso dell’European Social Forum” (with L. Alteri), paper presented in the Annual Congress of the SISP, Italian Society of Political Science.

(Hotel Tiziano e dei Congressi, 16-17 February): “Ambiti e forme organizzative nel rapporto tra società civile, Stato nazionale e Università pubblica”, paper presented during the National Forum of Young AVIS Members.
(University of Rome 3, 4-5 April): “Le dinamiche della globalizzazione nel realismo utopico dei movimenti globali”, paper presented during the National Congress on “The Utopia”.
(University of Pavia, 4-7 September): Chairman of the panel: “Partecipazione e associazionismo” (with R. Biorcio), in occasion of the XXII Congress of Sisp (Italian Society of Political Science).

(University of Pavia, 4-6 September): “Antagonismo sociale o calcolo delle compatibilità? La relazione controversa tra il Prc e il movimento per una giustizia globale”, paper presented during the National Congress of SISP (Italian Society of Political Science).

(University of Trento, 10-11 October): “Social Antagonism or calculus of compatibilities? The controversial relationship between the Refoundation Communist Party and the movement for a global Justice”, paper delivered in occasion of the Mid-Term Conference of the Research Network on Social Movements of the European Sociological Association (ESA).

(University of Rome La Sapienza, 21-22 May): “La Rifondazione Comunista alla prova del VII congresso: cultura politica, circolazione delle élites e ridefinizione delle asimmetrie di potere”, paper presented during the Meeting: “Il Gioco dei poteri nelle trasformazioni della democrazia”, of the Sectyion of Political Sociology of the AIS (Italian Sociological Association).

(University of Lisbon, 2-5 September): “The Political Project of the refoundation Communist Party: Sociology of a Party in Movement”, paper delivered in occasion of the 9th European Sociological Association (ESA).

(University of Lisbon, 4 September): “The «Social Connective Party» as alternative way to the "Cartel Party": The Case of The Refoundation Communist Party in Italy in its relationship to the Social Movements”, paper presented in the round table on “Social Movements and Political Participation in Italy”, at the Instituto de Ciências Sociais da Universidade de Lisboa.

(University IUAV of Venice, 16-18 September): Chairman of the panel: “Old and new theoretical perspectives in the analysis of social movements and political participation” (with L. Caruso), in occasion of the XXIV Conference of the Italian Political Science Association.

(European University Institute, 20-21 January): Chairman of the session: “Self-Governance and Democracy in On-Line Forums”, in occasion of the mid-term Conference of the research network on Social Movement of the European Sociological Association (ESA) in cooperation with the ECPR Standing Group “Forms of Participation”: “Transnational Democracy: Organization, Mobilization and Communication”.

(European University Institute, 20-21 January): “Is there Life beyond the Net for Collective Mobilization? The European Social Forum in Comparison with the Virtual Public Sphere” (with Luca Alteri), paper presented in occasion of the mid-term Conference of the research network on Social Movement of the European Sociological Association (ESA) in cooperation with the ECPR Standing Group “Forms of Participation”: “Transnational Democracy: Organization, Mobilization and Communication”.

(University of Massachussetts, Boston, 13 e 14 April): “The crisis of political parties and representative democracy in Antonio Gramsci. Elements for a sociology of political praxis” (with Loris Caruso), paper presented in occasion of the VIII Social Theory Forum: The Italian Social Theory from Antonio Gramsci to Giorgio Agamben.

(University of Geneva, 7-10 September): “History, Politics, and Social Mobilization: The contribution of Antonio Gramsci and Charles Tilly to the sociology of collective action and political Change”, paper presented in occasion of the 10th Conference of the European Sociological Association (ESA).

(University of Geneva, 7-10 September): Chairman of the session: “Culture, Organizational Innovations and Social Movements”, in occasion of the 10th Conference of the European Sociological Association (ESA).
(University of Rome3, 13-15 September): Chairman of the session: “Populism and Political Participation”, in occasion of the annual Congress of the Italian Political Science Association.

(University of Milan, November 30-December 1) :“Conflict, Participation and the Socio-political Change”, paper presented in occasion of the Round Table during the Mid-Term Conference of the RN on Political Sociology of the European Sociological Association.

(University of Rome “La Sapienza”, December 13): “The Crisis of the Democratic Representa-tion and of Political Parties”, paper presented in occasion of the workshop promoted by the RN of Political Sociology od the Italian Sociological Association on the theme: “Democracy in Transition and Political Parties”.
(University of Salento, 17-18 December): Discussant to the Young Sociologists Forum pro-moted by the Italian Sociological Association.
(University of Rome 3, March 7): “Globalization and the Crisis of the democratic Representa-tion”, Lecture in occasion of a Seminar promoted by the Department of Political Sciences.

(University of Salento, April 11-12), “New forms and practices of political participation in the crisis of the democratic representation”, paper discussed in occasion of the Mid-Term Conference of the Section of “Cultural Processes and Institutions” of the Italian Sociological Association.

(University of Perugia, April 26), special guest, as author, in the Symposium on the Books “Sociologia politica” (Political Sociology), Milan, McGraw-Hill, organized at the Narni teaching of the University of Perugia.

(University of Salento, May 6-7), Chairman of the session: “Toward a Social Theory of the Mediterranean”, in occasion of the Conference: “Toward a Sociology of the Mediterranean” organized by the Department of History, Society and Human Studies.

(University of Calabria, May 30), special guest, as author, in the Symposium on the Books “Sociologia politica” (Political Sociology), Milan, McGraw-Hill, organized by the Department of Political and Social Sciences.

(University of Turin, August 28-31), “De-politicization, Financialization, and the European Po-litical Drift Starting from the Analysis of the Italian Case”, paper presented in occasion of the general Congress of the ESA (European Sociological Association) on the theme: “Crisis, Cri-tique and Change”.
(University of Florence, September 12-14), Chairman of the session: “Economic Crisis and Political Participation”, in occasion of the XXVII Congress of the Italian Political Science Society.
(University of Florence, October 10-12), Chairman of the workshop: “Parties, Movements and New Forms of Democracy”, in occasion of the general Congress of the Italian Sociological Association.

(University of Salento, March 28-29), “Capitalism, Socialism and Democracy in Werner Som-bart” (with Vitantonio Gioia), paper presented in occasion of the Conference on: “Il borghese di Werner Sombart: cento anni dopo”.

(Universty of Bologna, June 10-11), “Which parties for wich democracy in a context of social and political malaise”, paper presented in occasion of the Conference organized by the Commitee for Political Sociology of the International Political Science Association (IPSA) and the International Sociological Association (ISA) on: “Political Parties: The Challenge of Organization and Representation in a Period of Social and Political Malaise”.

(University of Perugia, September 11-13), Chairman of the panel: “Le trasformazioni della partecipazione e il nuovo rapporto della politica con il territorio: le esperienze dei gruppi di base del Movimento 5 Stelle” (with Roberto Biorcio), in occasion of the XXVIII Congress of the Italian Political Science Society, SISP.

(University of Perugia, September 11-13), “L’attivismo di base del Movimento Cinque Stelle nel caso di Bari e Lecce”, paper presented in occasion of the XXVIII Congress of the Italian Political Science Society, SISP.

(University of Copenhagen, November 28-29), Chairman of the panel: “Grassroots Economic Activism in Times of Crisis and Precariousness: Social Resilience and New Socio-Political Practices” (with Francesca Forno and Paolo Graziano), in occasion of the Mid-Term Conference of the Research Network of Political Sociology of the European Sociological Association, ESA.

(University of Copenhagen, November 28-29), “The Italian Recovered Factories Movement Between Resistance and Resilience” (with Francesca Forno), paper presented in occasion of the Mid-Term Conference of the Research Network of Political Sociology of the European Sociological Association, ESA.

(University of Prague, August 25-29), “The Case of the Recovered Factories in Italy as a Strat-egy of Social Resilience and Resistance” (with Luca Antonazzo), paper presented in occasion of the 12th Conference of The European Sociologcal Association.

Chairman of the panel on: “Social Resilience and/or Social Resistance in times of Political and Economic Crisis”, during the 12th Conference of The European Sociologcal Association (University of Prague, August 25-29).

Chairman of the panel on: “Practices of Social Resilience/Resistance in times of Socio-political Crisis”, (with Gianni Piazza), during the XXIX Congress of SISP, the Italian Association of Political Science (University of Arcavacata, September 10-12).

Chairman of the panel on: “Practices of Social Resilience/Resistance in Times of Socio-Political Crisis” (with Gianni Piazza), during the Congress of the Section of Political Sciology of the AIS, Italian Association of Sociology (Universty of Catania, October 8-9).

(Luiss University, November 25), “Populism and the De-Politicization of Politics: An Open Reflection”, paper presented in occasion of the first meeting for the constitution of an Italian Network on Populism and Global Politics, promoted by the Political Sociology Section of the AIS Italian Association of Sociology.

Chairman of the panel on; “Social Movement and Resistance Practices in Times of Crisis”, during the XXX Congress of SISP, the Italian Association of Political Science (University of Milan, September 15-17).

Chairman of the panel on; “New Practices of Political Participation”, in occasion of the Mid-Term Conference of the Political Sociology Section of the AIS, Italian Association of Sociology (University of Genoa, October 6-7).
(University of Trento, October 17-18), “Contemporary Populism as output of the de-politicization processes", paper presented in occasion of the Conference of the European Network on Populism Studies.

(Vrije Universiteit Brussel; October 27-28), “Italian recovered factories: Between resilience and resistance” (with Luca Antonazzo), paper presented in occasion of the 4th Mid-Term Conference of the Research Network of Political Sociology of the European Sociological Association (ESA).

Chairman of the panel on; “The Political Consequences of Personal Experiences”, in occasion of the 4th Mid-Term Conference of the Research Network of Political Sociology of the European Sociological Association (Vrije Universiteit Brussel; October 27-28).

(University of Verona, November 10-12, 2016), "De-Politicizzazione e pratiche di resistenza sociale in epoca di crisi", paper presentato nel programma inter-sezionale (sezioni AIS di Sociologia politica e Sociologia del diritto) in occasione dell'XI Convegno AIS (Associazione Italiana di Sociologia).

Responsabilita' di studi e ricerche scie.content: Direttore del progetto di ricerca transnazionale dal titolo: “No Global Movement and the New Forms of Transnational Participation”, international surveys during the European Social Forums in Florence 2002, Paris 2003, London 2004, Athens 2006 (Principal investigator: Prof. Fabio de Nardis, University of Salento commissionato dal CRISPO, International Research Centre on Politics and Society).

Conseguimento di premi e riconoscimenti.content: Giudizio di idoneità a professore ordinario in Sociology with a focus on Social Movements and Organizations bandito dal CSO (Centre de Sociologie des Organisations) a Sciences Po, Paris. Giudizio di idoneità equivalente a una Habilitation to Full Professorship in Sociology (HDR à diriger des recherches). (Letter from Prof. Marc Lazar on behalf of the Scientific Council of Sciences Po: January 19, 2015)

Partecipazione al collegio dei docenti o.content: Membro del Collegio dei docenti del PhD program on "Social Theory and Research", University of Salento
Membro del collegio dei docenti del PhD program on “Human and Social Sciences” at the University of Salento, coordinatore del curriculum in Euro-Mediterranean Studies

Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: Adjunct Professor of Political Sociology and of Political Science at the Free Mediterranean University “Jean Monnet”
Adjunct Professor of Sociology at the Link Campus, University of Malta
Adjunct Professor of Political Science and Comparative Politics at the University of Naples “L’Orientale
Research Fellow at the Center for "European and Eurasian Studies" of the University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA)
Adjunct Professor of International Politics at the University of Rome “La Sapienza"

Specifiche esperienze professionali cara.content: Evaluator of Research projects for the University of Padova, University of Calabria, and University of Salento.

Referee per le seguenti riviste scientifiche e case editrici accreditate: American Journal of Sociological Research; DADA – Journal of Post-Global Anthropology; International Journal of Applied Sociology; Humanities and Social Sciences; Partecipazione e conflitto; Quaderni di Scienza Politica; Sociologica – Italian Journal of Sociology; Italian Sociological Review; SMP – Società, Mutamento, Politica; International Journal of Sociology and Anthropology; Cartografie Sociali; pubisher FrancoAngeli (Series on: Globalization, Participation and Social Movements; and Series on: Political Sociology); publisher Editori Riuniti (Series on: Social and Political Change).

Expert Evaluator for the European Commission of the projects proposed for the FP7 (VII programma quadro): Activity 8.5: “The Citizen in the European Union. Area 8.5.1: “Participation and citizenship in Europe”. SSH.2013.5.1-1: “Citizens’ resilience in times of crisis” (2013)
Member of the Executive Board of the Section of Political Sociology of the Italian Sociological Association (AIS)
Member of the Executive Board of the Research Network on Political Sociology of the European Sociological Association (ESA)
Member of the Scientific Board of the International Centre of Interdisciplinary Studies on Migrations (I.C.I.S.MI.) at the University of Salento
Referee for publications and Scientific Research Projects of High National Interest (Prin) on behalf of the Italian Ministry of Public Education (MIUR)
Chair of the Standing Group on “Social Movement and Participation” of the Italian Political Science Association (SISP)
Presidente di corso di laurea triennale in Sociologia e magistrale internazionale in Sociology and Social Research presso la University of Salento
(valutatore ANVUR) Referee for the Italian Academic Research Evaluation Agency (ANVUR) – VQR 2011-2014

Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: National Project on behalf of the UISP (Popular Sport Italian Union):: “Youh and Sport in the Main Italian Cities”. (Principal investigator: Prof. Fabio de Nardis, Sapienza University of Rome). The preliminary results of the surveys presented in an international workshop organized by the European Network on Sport and Social Sciences, on: Methodological Innovation in Social Research applied to Sports (Verbania, Italy, October 6-9, 1999).

Scientific Research Program of High National Interest (prin): “The Italian System at the Beginningof the New Century: Social and Political Change”. (Principal investigator: Prof.ssa Marisa Ferrari Occhionero, Sapienza University of Rome).

Scientific Research Program of High National Interest (prin): “The New Citizens in an Italy in Trasfomation. Youth and Democracy between Centrality and Marginality”. (Principal investigator: Prof. Gianfranco Bettin Lattes, University of Florence).

Scientific Research Program of High National Interest (prin): “The Ideological Representations of Europe in Political Parties and Social Movements” (Principal investigator: Prof. Gianfranco Bettin Lattes, University of Florence).
Scientific Research Program of High National Interest (prin): “The Professions of the Public Space beyond the Crisis”. (Principal Investigator: Prof. Mario Morcellini, Sapienza University of Rome).

“The Transformations of the Political Participation and the New Relationship of Politics with the Territories: The Italian Experience of the Activists of the Five Star Movement” (Principal investigator: Prof. Roberto Biorcio, University of Milan-Bicocca).
